column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Ugh I wanted to like this so bad
column2: but it just wasn't good! Came to visit from CA and had high hopes
column3: but it honestly just seems overhyped I've had better back home. We got "the Lou" and a salad and despite waiting 40 mins for our food to come out the deep dish was still room temperature so idk wtf that was about. Anyhow
